properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 9:58AM EST until January 8 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 24 knots from the west
with gusts up to 33 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 5 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 7 feet.

* WHERE...Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 8 AM EST
Wednesday with the largest waves expected around 8 AM EST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY
